author: henning
msg: Ah, the things I forgot. If you use Velocity with the Pull model, both
the Velocity Service and the Pull Service must run early, else the
registration of the pull tools will not work. Updated the master and
the derived configuration.
Synced master and config on the VelocityOnly layout.

Submitted by:
Reviewed by:

author: henning
msg: The new BaseService Broker no longer calls the "init(data)" method of
a service but just init() and relies on the service to fetch its
parameters from the Turbine class.
Added an init() method to the services where this was lacking and
deprecated the init(data) methods on all services.

author: henning
msg: There was decided that the <id> tags of the dependency
jars should be alphabetically ordered from a-z and that
all jars are mandatory. Cleaned up the sequence.
removed a second log4j reference (my bad)
